name: Batwoman
description:
This is a simple and quick 3D Platformer game. You are playing as Batwoman, and you must collect all of your Batarangs stolen by the Joker. You have one minute to collect all 22 Batarangs and avoid obstacles before the game ends.  This game is not for profit and only meant for fans to play and support the #SaveBatwoman campaign.

This game is still in development as I plan to add a few more levels and some minor bugs need to be addressed:

  • Fix Edge Issue
  • Mobile Gaming Compatibility

Constructive and positive feedback is welcome!

#SaveBatwoman

Please show support for the return of Batwoman by signing the petition.  You can also read more about the journey to #SaveBatwoman here.  

Note

Also, if you want to see more of my creations, follow me on twitter @shesponse
